        public void testUpdatePlayerExists()

      • testUpdatePlayerStatus

        public void testUpdatePlayerStatus()
        Tests updating the status inside a PlayerState

      • testUpdatePlayerRename

        public void testUpdatePlayerRename()
        Checks: 1) giving another name to an existing playerState. 2) creating another PlayerState if there was no one with the "previous name".

      • testFinalRefreshPlayerStatus

        public void testFinalRefreshPlayerStatus()
        Initialization: Add several playerstates, and then set their status as winners/losers using the method addWinners(...) in VictoryState. Test: the method finalRefreshPlayerStatus must update correctly the status of each player (in the game, they will be displayed by the Swing GUI).
